blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: No Smoking! - DISNEY Reporter
title: No Smoking! - DISNEY Reporter
body:
No Smoking! – DISNEY Reporter

Welcome to a very full edition of DISNEYReporter. This week, there was a lot of news coming out of the Disneyland Resort. This includes changes to policies for smoking and strollers, new parking options, and new attractions! Over at Walt Disney World, Rafiki’s Animal Watch is returning this summer. In movie news, Dumbo has flown into theaters. Also, the synopsis for Marvel’s Avengers: Endgame has…

blog.name: voicemailsfrompeterparker
blog.title: Voicemails From Peter Parker
blog.description:
A collection of voicemail transcriptions from Peter Parker to Tony Stark.
Documented by F.R.I.D.A.Y and @foxbowl (updates every Friday). 

Click here to see Peter's voicemails in chronological order!
Request for a voicemail and F.R.I.D.A.Y. will try to find it in her archives ↓

tags: requests are closed until after Endgame (?) but I still like reading your messages (they make me so happy you dont understand) -Foxbowl
summary: ————————————————————— Voicemail #39 To: Tony Stark From: Peter Parker Hey… so remember how I called you yesterday during that...
body:
—————————————————————

Voicemail #39

To: Tony Stark

From: Peter Parker

Hey… so remember how I called you yesterday during that press conference? And my contact name with the word ‘Kid’ showed up on live television?

Well, of course you remember that, it was like 12 hours ago, what am I saying, I’m so stupid-

But anyways. I woke up to all those articles about ‘Tony Stark and His Secret Child!’, ‘Tony Stark Has Contact Listed as ‘Kid’’, ‘Tony Stark’s Big Secret Revealed!’.

Well, this is kinda my fault so sorry about that, Mr. Stark. But these stories don’t last long, right? People forget about things like this, right? I mean, I could pretend to be your kid if you want me to but I don’t think it’ll come to that, right?

Well, if you need me, just give me a call. Away from the paparazzi.

—————————————————————

summary: Avengers: Endgame Trailer Footage Shows Hawkeye Battling Familiar Marvel Villains!
title: Avengers: Endgame Trailer Footage Shows Hawkeye Battling Familiar Marvel Villains!
body:
Avengers: Endgame Trailer Footage Shows Hawkeye Battling Familiar Marvel Villains!

Avengers: Endgame 3D trailer footage appears to show familiar Avengers: Infinity War villains hunting down Hawkeye.

After LEGO Avengers: Endgame toy sets were revealed, there was quite a bit of speculation that Thanos’ Outriders would return in Avengers: Endgame. And now 3D trailer footage appears to show the Outriders hunting down Hawkeye.

You can see the Outriders in the 3D trailer below. They…

summary: On Avengers: Endgame’s runtime:
title: On Avengers: Endgame’s runtime:
body:
I know a lot of people are having a laugh about people complaining about the movie’s length in the post-Lord of the Rings world we live in. But I will say this in defense of those side-eying a 3-hr Avengers movie, as somebody who endured Lord of the Rings movies in the theatre: 

If it’s good, you won’t even notice it’s that long. Most people know this. But the problem is we have no guarantees it WILL be good, and experience makes us wary. If it’s NOT good, especially in the third act (I am looking at you, Desolation of fucking Smaug), every shot in the last half hour that DOESN’T shift to the end credits will 1) completely enrage you, 2) enlarge the contents of your bladder, and 3) piss directly in your eye.

summary: I just asked a coworker if she’ll go watch Endgame with me at midnight on 24th of april. Which is like. The first chance to...
body:
I just asked a coworker if she’ll go watch Endgame with me at midnight on 24th of april. Which is like. The first chance to watch the movie.
Needless to say, we’ll both have to work the next day. That’d be like 4 hours of sleep.

But. I want this. I really, really want this.

summary: Ormai siamo alle porte della parte significativa del marketing per Avengers: Endgame, e mentre aspettiamo che qualcosa di nuovo...
body:
Ormai siamo alle porte della parte significativa del marketing per Avengers: Endgame, e mentre aspettiamo che qualcosa di nuovo venga rilasciato fra clip e promo vari, possiamo tornare a dare un’occhiata ai fantastici character poster dedicati ai personaggi sopravvissuti o meno alla decimazione compiuta da Thanos, una al nuovo poster per il mercato internazionale, e una nuova all’ultima “offerta” della Hot Toys.

Con la campagna marketing ormai nel vivo, la Hot Toys ha rivelato la prima action figures dedicata alla pellicola corale diretta dai fratelli Russo, in scala 1/6. La action figure prende il nome di “Mark 85”, lasciando quindi intendere l’arrivo di una nuova armatura di Iron Man.

Non sappiamo di specifico cosa avrà di nuovo quest’armatura, ma dalle immagini possiamo immaginare che anche questa sia un prodotta nanotecnologico, quindi composta da nanoparticelle che fuoriescono da un alloggio posto sul petto di Tony Stark, e quindi si può anche ricombinare secondo il pensiero del suo “pilota”. Fra le novità par presentare un nuovo tipo di reattore sulla schiena, che a giudicare dalla posizione degli stabilizzatori di volo incorporati dovrebbe permette una maggiore mobilità a mezz’aria.

In ultimo il look stesso dell’armatura torna ad essere più vicino alla controparte fumettistica, con toni di oro sulle braccia e sulle gambe, e la prevalenza del rosso.

Potete vedere la figure qui sotto:















Il grave ciclo di eventi messo in atto da Thanos che ha spazzato via metà dell’universo e fratturato i ranghi dei Vendicatori, costringe i rimanenti a prendere una posizione finale nella grande conclusione di ventidue film dei Marvel Studios, Avengers: Endgame.

Avengers: Endgame uscirà nelle sale italiane il 24 aprile 2019, con Anthony e Joe Russo alla regia, su una sceneggiatura di Christopher Markus e Stephen McFeely, basato sui fumetti di Jack Kirby e Jim Starlin e prodotto da Kevin Feige.

Nel cast Robert Downey Jr. (Tony Stark / Iron Man), Chris Evans (Steve Rogers / Capitan America),Chris Hemsworth (Thor), Scarlett Johansson (Natasha Romanoff / Vedova Nera), Jeremy Renner (Clint Barton / Occhio di Falco), Mark Ruffalo (Bruce Banner / Hulk), Brie Larson (Carol Danvers / Capitan Marvel), Karen Gillan (Nebula), Bradley Cooper (Rocket Racoon), Paul Rudd (Scott Lang / Ant-Man), Ty Simpkins (Harley Keener) e Josh Brolin (Thanos).

La fotografia è a cura di Trent Opaloch, mentre la colonna sonora è composta da Alan Silvestri.

Hot Toys presenta l’action figure della Mark 85 per Avengers: Endgame Ormai siamo alle porte della parte significativa del marketing per Avengers: Endgame, e mentre aspettiamo che qualcosa di nuovo venga rilasciato fra

Il grave ciclo di eventi messo in atto da Thanos che ha spazzato via metà dell’universo e fratturato i ranghi dei Vendicatori, costringe i rimanenti a prendere una posizione finale nella grande conclusione di ventidue film dei Marvel Studios, Avengers: Endgame.

Avengers: Endgame uscirà nelle sale italiane il 24 aprile 2019, con Anthony e Joe Russo alla regia, su una sceneggiatura di Christopher Markus e Stephen McFeely, basato sui fumetti di Jack Kirby e Jim Starlin e prodotto da Kevin Feige.

Nel cast Robert Downey Jr. (Tony Stark / Iron Man), Chris Evans (Steve Rogers / Capitan America),Chris Hemsworth (Thor), Scarlett Johansson (Natasha Romanoff / Vedova Nera), Jeremy Renner (Clint Barton / Occhio di Falco), Mark Ruffalo (Bruce Banner / Hulk), Brie Larson (Carol Danvers / Capitan Marvel), Karen Gillan (Nebula), Bradley Cooper (Rocket Racoon), Paul Rudd (Scott Lang / Ant-Man), Ty Simpkins (Harley Keener) e Josh Brolin (Thanos).

La fotografia è a cura di Trent Opaloch, mentre la colonna sonora è composta da Alan Silvestri.

Hot Toys presenta l’action figure della Mark 85 per Avengers: Endgame Ormai siamo alle porte della parte significativa del marketing per Avengers: Endgame, e mentre aspettiamo che qualcosa di nuovo venga rilasciato fra

summary: I’m gonna be bitter about Pepperony in Endgame. So bitter. Despite my hate for the actress, despite their relationship that I...
body:
I’m gonna be bitter about Pepperony in Endgame. So bitter. Despite my hate for the actress, despite their relationship that I find so unequal, her attitude towards him that is so disrespectful, there is one point that I will never agree with : When she tells him he can’t continue to be Iron Man and he can’t be a father while he’s Iron Man.

Tony Stark is Iron Man. This is what “You can take everything away from me but there is one thing you will never take, I’m Iron Man” means. Tony is a hero, that’s what he discovered in Afghanistan, that’s what he became and it’s not a side job or a self destructing hobby.

Refusing to have a child because he’s a hero is one thing, I’m okay with that, but forcing him to change while showing off a child like a carrot is another. If she doesn’t want to have a child with a superhero because she’s afraid it’s her right ! But then she has to let him go and not ask him to change who he is for her. Like all the militaries’ wifes do, like all the couples who love each other but have different way of life.

If the end of Tony Stark’s storyline is for him to drop the armor and go quietly obey what Pepper will tell him to do with his life… Urgh.

So yeah, bitter.

summary:
So you guys saw new Avengers endgame posters right? Me too and i noticed something interesting.
They have this strange gem like...
body:
NEW AVENGERS 4 POSTERS

So you guys saw new Avengers endgame posters right? Me too and i noticed something interesting.

They have this strange gem like effect on the sides.

Maybe Marvel hint at that the rest will be rescuing others from soul stone(stones)/will eventually be in gems and dull Thanos on background doesn’t help this at all

summary: Como Chris Evans se tornou o "Capitão América" e qual a importância de seu posicionamento contra atitudes e personalidades...
title: Como Chris Evans se tornou o "Capitão América" e qual a importância de seu posicionamento contra atitudes e personalidades extremistas?
body:
Como Chris Evans se tornou o “Capitão América” e qual a importância de seu posicionamento contra atitudes e personalidades extremistas?

Quando Chris Evans foi oficialmente escalado como Steve Rogers, o Capitão América, houveram muitos fãs que inicialmente tiveram um ataque. Por quê? Porque Evans já havia tocado Johnny Storm ak.a. “O Tocha Humana” no Quarteto Fantástico. Como um ator poderia interpretar dois personagens diferentes no mesmo universo?

Bem, eles (Quarteto Fantástico) não eram realmente parte do mesmo “universo” que o

View On WordPress
